group_1.textLeft: ...Oh, this book!

group_1.textRight: ...Mm? "My First Love is the Milky Way"?
That's the series Kazumi got into recently.
What kind of story is it?

group_1.textLeft: It's a romantic comedy,@but if I tell you too much about it,
I'll probably spoil it for you.
But the plot twist in volume 17 is really amazing,
so definitely give it a read!

group_1.textRight: Aren't 17 volumes a lot to recommend to a beginner?
The people who have kept up with it for that long@would already be fans, wouldn't they...?

group_1.textLeft: Mmmm... You have a point...!
Say, are there any of Umika's books here?

group_1.textRight: Yes, we have this corner for them...
That's a bestselling author for you!

group_1.textLeft: Lately, Umika's books seem to have gotten@very popular with young women.
Any new stock sells out almost instantly...

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah, she even got on TV the other day, right?
"The popular middle-schooler author!"
As I recall, you were invited to a convention in France
to make a presentation on Japanese culture...@correct?

group_1.textLeft: Urk, so you've all watched that.
It's a little embarrassing how terrible I looked@on camera...
*Sniff-sniff*@...That's the amazing smell of meat cutlets!

group_1.textRight: It's a speciality of this shopping district.

group_1.textLeft: Is it really?!

group_1.textRight: But the number one specialty@of this shopping district... is here.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...? [chara:401401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:401401:motion_400][chara:401401:cheek_0][chara:401401:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:401401:lipSynch_1]Oh, this is!

group_1.textCenter: Woahhhhh?! It's, like,@a whole swarm of customersãƒ¼!

group_1.textRight: A whole swarm...@Couldn't you have found a better way to put it?

group_1.textLeft: Just felt like sayin'!@Viva! Welcome to the Counseling Center!

group_1.textRight: Emilyyy!

group_1.textLeft: Kazumin! What's up?@[chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300601:cheek_0][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1]...Or, er, huh?

group_1.textRight: What's with that reaction?
...What's wrong?

group_1.textLeft: Your hair! Your hair!@Hasn't it gotten, like, way too much longer?!

group_1.textRight: Thought so, it's really bein' a sticking point...

group_1.textCenter: When I came to Kamihama before,
this place helped me out a whole lot!

group_1.textLeft: It sounded like that time was a big mix-up involving@most all of the Magical Girls.
Weeell, it all ended up okey-dokey, yeah?
You got to meet so many peeps and all!
Indeed, it is not a bad memory at all.

group_1.textRight: That's why so many of us came here when we heard
that you were all visiting from Asunaro.

group_1.textLeft: It's been way too long, Kaoru!

group_1.textRight: Natsuki!@Yeah, it really has!

group_1.textLeft: Well, then, now that everybody's here...
...onto shopping we go!
